localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: With the new Apple Silicon Macs, A lot of people want to know about compatibility for specific apps, however, with thousands of apps that can be run on Mac it can be difficult to know if the app you need is compatible before you buy an Apple Silicon Mac.
blogPost.body: With the new Apple Silicon Macs, A lot of people want to know about compatibility for specific apps, however, with thousands of apps that can be run on Mac it can be difficult to know if the app you need is compatible before you buy an Apple Silicon Mac.
blogPost.title: Apple Silicon App Test - Test your apps for compatibility before you buy an M1 Mac
blogPost.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 随着新的苹果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定应用的兼容性，然而，由于Mac上可以运行的应用有数千种，因此在购买苹果Silicon Mac之前，很难知道你需要的应用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在购买M1 Mac之前，请测试您的应用程序的兼容性。

localize.description: 隨着新的蘋果Silicon Mac的推出，很多人都想了解特定應用的兼容性，然而，由於Mac上可以運行的應用有數千種，因此在購買蘋果Silicon Mac之前，很難知道你需要的應用是否兼容。
localize.tagline: 在購買M1 Mac之前，請測試您的應用程序的兼容性。

previous.excerpt: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!
previous.title: PERKS - The Google Campus Experience digitized

localize.description: PERKS适用于远程团队、创业公司、临时工、学生等。未来的工作需要一个新的系统来为人们提供所需的工具，让他们过上快乐和高效的工作生活。我们打造PERKS是为了给大家带来最好的校园体验!
PERKS適用於遠程團隊、創業公司、臨時工、學生等。未來的工作需要一個新的系統來爲人們提供所需的工具，讓他們過上快樂和高效的工作生活。我們打造PERKS是爲了給大家帶來最好的校園體驗!
